thread.title: Phone app to help cyclists report road problems designed by student

title: Phone app to help cyclists report road problems designed by student
text:
Phone app to help cyclists report road problems designed by student 3:37am EDT - 01:56
An English university student has designed a new bicycle light that helps cyclists report dangerous hot spots to councils, as Jim Drury reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
An English university student has designed a new bicycle light that helps cyclists report dangerous hot spots to councils, as Jim Drury reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Kz9OMZ
